articles.title: Microsoft's Copilot is trying to appeal to the masses, not power users, and that's a mistake - Windows Central
articles.description: AI enthusiasts are choosing to use ChatGPT over Copilot, all while Microsoft attempts to appeal to a wider audience in a way that I don't think wants Copilot in its current form.
